name: huggingface_bulk_search_models
description: Search multiple model queries on Hugging Face in parallel.

detailSteps.code: const results = []; const cards = document.querySelectorAll('article, main a[href]:has(h4)'); for (let i = 0; i < Math.min(cards.length, 5); i++) { const card = cards[i]; const titleEl = card.querySelector('h4'); if (!titleEl) continue; const link = card.closest('a[href]') || card.querySelector('a[href]') || card; const spans = Array.from(card.querySelectorAll('span')).map(s => s.textContent.trim()).filter(Boolean); results.push({ name: titleEl.textContent.trim(), url: link.href || '', meta: spans.slice(0, 4) }); } const params = new URLSearchParams(window.location.search); return { query: params.get('search') || '', result_count: results.length, results };
detailSteps.name: results
